p: For flood height distributions from 2010 to 2100, mean future flood heights range between 0.4 m (MPI model RCP 4.5 SLR scenario) and 0.7 m (CCSM4 model RCP 8.5 SLR scenario with AIS contribution from ref. 26) greater than modern mean flood heights. For flood height distributions from the IPSL model from 2010 to 2300, mean future flood heights range between 1.3 m (RCP 4.5 SLR scenario) and 5.6 m (RCP 8.5 SLR scenario with AIS contribution from ref. 26) greater than modern mean flood heights.
